Have questions about our summer camps? Want to make sure it’s the right fit for your child? Book a one-on-one chat with one of our friendly camp counsellors!

Whether you're wondering about daily activities, camper safety, food options, or what to pack—we're here to help.

Choose a time that works for you, and we’ll be happy to guide you through everything.

🗓️ Available by video or phone

👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 Parents and kids are both welcome

📍 No commitment—just friendly advice
